Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: woooo boy https://dexstats.info/snapshots/BTCH_snapshot.json is a big JSON file, don't be downloading that all the time in a frontend JS code üòÉ

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @CHMEX in the json you will find a block height, and also number of utxos on the chain. those might be useful stats on your web frontend

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @CHMEX i see that BTCH is not in your UI, because the json it produces is so large most likely. I can make it so `getsnapshot 500` only returns the top 500 in the richlist, and then you can add BTCH to dexstats richlists. Sound good?

Content:
Hi @dukeleto
That would be a great idea can you make it getsnapshot n where n is a integer? Yes the btch snapshot is about 600mb I did not load it yet to the db because of the size. I will enrich it with the height and timestamp later.

Author: amoeba#7136
Content:
hello Komodo team. We are in the process of building an orderbook exchange for the Indian Market and would like to list KMD. Could someone here guide us as to what would be the most efficient option to manage only user send and receives? Ideally, we would like to run a simple litewallet, if not available we will set up a full node.  KMD has several repositories on Git so, not really sure which option would be the best for us.  

Cheers!

Author: amoeba#7136
Content:
Our current product is an OTC Liquidity platform for BTC and ETH. 
https://www.throughbit.com/

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo would be the repo to use for an exchange

Author: amoeba#7136
Content: Cheers @jl777c

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: running a full node is recommended for any exchanges

Author: amoeba#7136
Content: yes, we're going for a full node with KMD> we want to eventually extend our services into wallet services like BitGo for a select few of the currencies we will be listing. KMD is one of the few so, full node it is.

Author: jl777c#5810

Author: jl777c#5810

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
cd ~
git clone https://github.com/jl777/komodo
cd komodo
git checkout dev
./zcutil/fetch-params.sh
./zcutil/build.sh -j$(nproc)

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
start with:

sudo apt-get install build-essential pkg-config libc6-dev m4 \
        g++-multilib autoconf libtool ncurses-dev unzip git python \
        zlib1g-dev wget bsdmainutils automake libboost-all-dev \
        libssl-dev libprotobuf-dev protobuf-compiler \
        libqrencode-dev libdb++-dev ntp ntpdate vim software-properties-common \
        curl libevent-dev libcurl4-gnutls-dev cmake clang
